name: 鄭鈺潔
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。上述課程內容將是資工系專業需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
week	Speak up	
1	Speak up-1	What is Physics? 
2	Speak up-2	Intro to Motion
3	Speak up-3	Intro to Force, Energy, and Work
4		Holidays
5	Speak up-4	Intro to Potential Energy and Conservation 
6	Speak up-5	Intro to Circular Motion
7	Speak up-6	Gravitation
8		Holidays
9	Exam
10		Exam discussion
11-12	Speak up-7	Intro to Electric Potential and Circuits
13-14	Speak up-8	Intro to Electromagnetic waves
15		Final project discussion
16-17		Final project- presentation
scorePolicy:
Speak up 40%
Midterm proposal 10%
Final Project 20%
Homework Exercises and Quiz  30% (1 hours Tuesday)
Participation 10%
-1 point / absence
materials: Principles of Physics Tenth Edition David Halliday
